Row.Text: +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Caravans and Cargo Ships. Resource diversity grants twice as much [ICON_GOLD] Gold for Portugal in [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes.

This melee naval unit replaces the Caravel and is skilled at exploration. Nau is faster and stronger than the Caravel, and when it is in a tile next to land owned by another Civilization or City-State you are at peace with, it may perform a one-time trade mission to earn [ICON_GOLD] Gold and XP. The further the land is from your own capital, the greater the bonus, so it is best to use on distant players. Use this unit to explore the map and uncover the locations of other players.

Melee naval unit which excels at sea exploration. It has more [ICON_MOVES] Movement and [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength than the Caravel, which it replaces, and can perform a one-time ability next to foreign lands to earn [ICON_GOLD] Gold and XP. May only be built by the Portuguese.

May only be built by the Portuguese.
